definition: to grasp/to hold/to operate/to manage/to control/to steer/to exercise/to drill (practice)/to play/to speak (a language)
warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if
stick/pole/lever/classifier for long objects such as guns

sentences.english: These levers were used to open the barrier inside the pond.
sentences.chinese: 這些操縱桿用來開放池子內部的遮擋板。

sentences.english: The lock stops the quick release lever from opening fully.
sentences.chinese: 安全鎖能防止快速釋放操縱桿完全打開。

sentences.english: The remaining control participants used a normal joystick.
sentences.chinese: 其餘人則使用普通的操縱桿。

sentences.english: Use the joystick or navigation keys to select the pocket.
sentences.chinese: 使用操縱桿或者導航鍵來選擇口袋。

sentences.english: Remember joysticks? Those old things you used to control your game characters?
sentences.chinese: 還記得曾經的那些遊戲操縱桿和角色操控設備嗎？

sentences.english: The Scout is operated by a joystick handset that also displays the video feed.
sentences.chinese: 這種機器人由一部有放像功能的手持操縱桿操作。

sentences.english: One was a set of shut-off rods.
sentences.chinese: 一套是一系列的切斷停止操縱桿。

sentences.english: The thumb-operated joysticks have similar mobility to the human shoulder and wrist.
sentences.chinese: 這個由拇指控制的操縱桿就好比是人的肩膀和手腕。

sentences.english: Turn the red operating lever of the battery disconnect switch anti-clockwise.
sentences.chinese: 順時針旋轉蓄電池切斷開關的紅色操縱桿。

sentences.english: There is also a Wagner joy stick system which gives auxiliary power assistance to steering and reverse.
sentences.chinese: 另外還備有瓦特納操縱桿爲轉舵和倒車提供備用動力。
